Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Jiggle \Jig"gle\, v. i. [Freq. of jig.] To wriggle or frisk about; to move awkwardly; to shake up and down. [1913 Webster]
jiggle n : a slight irregular shaking motion [syn: {joggle}] v : move to and fro; "Don't jiggle your finger while the nurse is putting on the bandage!" [syn: {joggle}, {wiggle}]
